title: LA-24-16: Application of the Standards of Conduct to Presidential Inaugural Events
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/0908EB02D365DA3285258BE800530795/$FILE/LA-24-16 Application of the Standards of Conduct to Presidential Inaugural Events.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory provides guidance on the ethical requirements relevant for executive branch employees during a presidential Inauguration celebration.
